mapper.select: select a.org_code orgcode, b.exe_csqn applyid, b.result_date bgrq, a.patient_id patientid, a.patient_type patienttype, a.inhosno from lis_test_reg a, lis_test_reg_his_item_detail b where a.org_code = b.org_code and a.reg_id = b.reg_id and a.is_adjustSample = '1' and b.exe_csqn is not null and b.exe_csqn != '' and b.result_date is not null and b.result_date>=to_date(#{begtime} , 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') and b.result_date<=to_date(#{endtime} , 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') group by a.org_code, b.exe_csqn, b.result_date, a.patient_id, a.patient_type, a.inhosno
